content.raw:
the pipeline had a lot of flaky tests in pull request #255, so I merged with it broken, but then it turns out there was a codecheck error hiding.

this runs `make codecheck` before `make test` so codecheck errors don't get obscured by flaky tests.

it runs after `make install` so we don't let codecheck complaints obscure build failures

is this reasonable?
